Class NatureFeature

java.lang.Object
NatureFeature
public class NatureFeature extends Object
This defines the nature features that players can encounter on the trail. Each feature has a type, name and space penalty. Examples: Creek, Bridge, Fallen Tree, Ladder.

    • NatureFeature

      public NatureFeature()
      Default constructor- creates a feature with no penalty.

    • NatureFeature

      public NatureFeature(char featureType)
      Creates a nature features for the game, based on the specified feature type. Handles Creek, Bridge, Fallen Tree, Ladder, None.
      Parameters:
      featureType - The character feature code for this feature.
